errors.is-email: Must be a valid email address
errors.min-length: Minimum length must be greater than {length} characters
errors.max-length: Maximum length must be less than {length} characters

messages.confirm-logout: Are you sure you want to log out?
messages.confirm-logout-2: After logging out you will not be able to access your account until you log in again.

home-page.section-1-description: Personal Notes Management Application, Simple yet Powerful
home-page.section-2-description-1: This app is the ultimate tool for capturing and organizing your inspiration! Wherever you are, simply tap the screen to instantly capture your ideas and organize them by topic for easy review at any time. With its rich text editing and categorization features, distinguishing between two types of ideas is effortless, ensuring that every thought is neatly organized.
home-page.section-2-description-2: Let this app be your handy assistant in creative organization!
